resources.string: Powerful Questions
What do I really want?
What is most important for me in life?
What is the purpose of my life?
What is my highest vision for myself?
What is the next level of my life purpose?
How do I be more creative?
How do I be a visionary?
How to I keep myself from backsliding?
Why do I backslide at all?
Why do I have ego backlashes?
What new product or service could change the world?
What does the world really need right now?
What causes me to get in a rut?
What motivates me?
What excites me?
What would I do if I had no fear or limitation?
How am I dishonest with myself?
What am I avoiding in my life?
What ideological positions or beliefs do I cling to?
What am I unwilling to let go of in life?
Why aren’t I able to surrender?
Why is my mind so active all the time?
Why do I have emotions?
What is the purpose of my emotions?
Why are people selfish?
Why does religion exist?
Why are there so many different kinds of religion?
Why do people disagree about non-duality?
Where is humanity headed in the future?
What is my role in humanity’s future?
What is my role in society?
Why do I judge, criticize and complain?
What’s the function of judging, criticizing and complaining?
How am I failing to take responsibility for my life?
What does it mean to be more conscious ? What are some examples of?
How is my worldview holding me back?
What is my worldview?
Why do I love x? (fill in x with whatever you want)?
What is the next stage of evolution for my business/career?
What is the next stage of my business or career?
Why do I truly believe I need to have in order to be happy?
Why do I meditate?
Why do I want this relationship?
What is the most powerful question that I could ask?
What important questions are not being asked in this situation?
How do I become successful?
What makes people so effective?
How am I unique?
How am I not being true to my uniqueness?
How do I become a better leader/artist/parent/person/x?
What am I like when I’m at my best?
What am I like when I’m at my worst?
In what ways am I a devil?
How are x and y the same? how are x and y different?
What are some totally new ways I could live my life?
Why am I resisting x(fill in x with whatever you want)?
Why am I afraid of x(fill in x with whatever you want)?
What would be my ideal job?
what will I regret most on my deathbed?
How am I being inauthentic and why?
What am I most proud of my life and how can I do more of that?
What robs me of energy and passion?
How could I use my mind in better ways?
Why are there so many deluded people in the world? How can I make sure that I don’t end up like them?
What is the lesson here?
What are the top 5 ideas from this book?
What causes me stress?
What is stress?
What do I admire about that person?
What lessons could I learn from that person?(include negative examples)?
What would a permanent fix for this x be (fill in x with whatever you want)?
What is the root of this __ problem?(fill in__with whatever you want) What opportunities am I overlooking?
If I could get the answer to any question, what question would I ask?
What makes me feel creative?
When am I at my most creative?
What would be a more authentic way of doing this?
What would be a more authentic way of doing my job/flirting with women/relating to my children/?
What would be a better way of doing this?
How does this look from another persons point of view?
What top 3 things would transform my life?
What makes me come alive?
Why does this trigger me?
How can I be more aligned with God/Universe/Buddha/Higher Self/Source/Energy?
Why am I struggling with __?(fill in__with whatever you want)
Where can I find the answers?
How am I being selfish?
How can I make my psychedelic experiences stick in everyday life?
What’s holding mankind back?
What’s the big picture here?
What are the most common traps here? (eg. enlightenment/meditation/starting business/dating/having children?)
If this thing that I’m doing fails, what will be the most likely causes?
What am I really good at?
How is my thinking about this limited?
Who could give me good advice on this topic?
What if my core assumptions are wrong about this situation?
What are my core assumptions?
How could I change my core assumptions?
What could I change if I had more confidence in myself?
How am I being reactive and defensive ?
What am I really trying to say here?
How am I creating this problem?
How could I make this task more enjoyable?
How am I being closed-minded?
What are the most powerful self-help techniques?
How can I become financially independent?
What should be the next chapter in my life?
What am i missing?
What are my advantages?
What are my disadvantages?
What kind of challenges am I avoiding and why?
What questions do I frequently ask myself?
How do I discover and understand my advantages?
How do I discover and understand my disadvantages?
On what way do I use self-knowledge to become better ?
What are you trying not to see but you really do see?
What do you see but trying not to see?
In what ways you sabotage your self?
What lies do you tell your self?
What is courage?
What is the deepest emotion you ever felt?
What is the most beautiful thing in the world?
How do you maximize your potential?
How do you reward your self?
How to fix emotional problems?
How to practice spirituality better?
How to meditate better?
How to fix your relationship?
How to fix money problems?

These questions below are philosophical and I think they wont have that much impact on your life like questions above.Because of that i did not include them in random generator.But they are important 
 
Metaphysical: About reality 
 
-How come existence exists at all? 
-What is existence? 
-How is existence related to non-existence? 
-Why is reality structured as it is? 
-Are there other possible ways reality can be ordered other than our own? 
-Why are the laws of physics the way they are? 
-Which comes first: consciousness or matter? Does consciousness come out of matter of does matter occur within consciousness? 
-What is matter, energy, space, time? 
-What is outside the universe? Is it infinite or finite? Why? 
-What existed before the big bang? 
-How does the material interact with the immaterial? 
-What governs what’s possible and impossible in the universe? What sets limits on the universe? 
-What governs emergent properties (eg atoms, molecules)? 
-How can emergent properties arise out of nowhere? 
-What makes a thing a thing? What is an object (a single thing, multiple things)? 
-Does reality have a bottom most scale? Eg lower than atoms, and lower than that. Does reality have a top most scale eg higher than planets, universes etc. Are there limits or do the levels go infinitely up and down 
-Does the evolution of the universe have a purpose? If so, where does it lead to? 
-Does external reality exist at all? 
-What is God? What would the concept of God entail? 
-What are thoughts? 
-How did life start? Aka Where did it all come from? 
-What is time? 
 
Epistemic: The study of knowledge 
 
-How do we know what we know? 
-How can I know anything for certain? 
-What makes justifications valid? 
-Why do billions of people believe in God? 
-Why do people disagree about good and bad, right and wrong, moral and immoral? 
-How come intelligent people delude themselves? Eg scientists who are creationists. How can I be sure that I’m not deluded? 
-How do I know that I’m not indoctrinated aka brainwashed into believing things without thinking about them myself. 
-What is science? Is it the best way of arriving at knowledge? 
-What are the limits of science? Are there things that science can’t understand/explain? 
-What is mathematics? What makes it valid? 
-What are the limits of mathematics? Is it displayed by reality or projected by the human mind? 
-What is rationality? How does it work and why is it valid? Limitless? Displayed by reality or projected by the human mind` 
-Which is more valid, the senses, rationality, or intuition? 
-What are the biases/blind spots of humanity as a whole? 
-How do animals understand reality? 
-Are there creatures with higher intelligence than humans? If so, how can we be certain of our knowledge? 
-Why is human knowledge taken as the ultimate truth? 
-What is truth? Is is objective or subjective 
-Where does understanding come from? How can we rely upon it? 
-What is the ultimate truth? 
-What is the best way to acquire knowledge? 
-Is reality understandable? Can humans understand it all or not because we are limited 
 
Self: You as an individual 
 
-How can I be sure that I exist at all? 
-If I exist, what am I? Biological? How do I know? 
-How did I, aka the indentity of me, come into being? 
-What justifies indentifying with the body or the mind? If the body is yours and the mind is too, who owns these things 
-If I am the body and the mind, what is everything else. Where do ‘I’ stop and the rest of the world begin? 
-What is in control of my thoughts? 
-What is my role in reality? My purpose? 
-How should I live my life to maximise happiness? \ 
-Consciousness: The mind and all mental fabrications 
 
-What is consciousness? 
-How is perception possible? 
-What unifies our senses into a seamless experience? 
-What if there are higher levels of consciousness? What would that mean for our understanding of the world? 
-What about the different levels of consciousness eg on psychedelics, meditation. What do they mean? Are they better/worse/more or less real than ordinary consciousness? 
-Are consciousnesses separate or is consciousness one thing? 
-Can artificial consciousness be created 
-Can consciousness be split or joined? 
-Could inanimate matter be conscious? 
-Is consciousness only accessible to higher level beings or is it everywhere in the world? 
-What are the laws governing qualities (qualities of the senses)?
in here I will put description and 5 tasks
